Common

Collaboration diagram for Common:

This module contains classes and types that are common to the client and the server. More...


Modules

 Chunk
 This module contains the chunking system, which is used on the client and server to stream world content.
 cstdmf
 This module contains stardard classes like smartpointer, as well as profiling and debugging classes.
 Entity
 This module contains classes for dealing with entities.
 Math
 This module contains classes that handle vectors, quaternions, portals, bounding boxes, lines, planes, among others.
 Network
 This module contains classes related to the network connection.
 physics
 This module implements bsp, quadtree, hulltree, and worldpoly classes and handles collision detection.
 ResMgr
 This module handles file operations on all resources.
 Script
 This module contains classes related to Python scripting.
 zlib
 This module implements zip codecs.

Detailed Description

This module contains classes and types that are common to the client and the server.
